doc.title: E-Force
doc.plot: Ride along with the real-life E-Force, and see how they uncover, track down, and apprehend Nature's arch enemies. It's a gritty, unfiltered look at the criminals targeting your environment and the HEREOS who struggle to keep it safe. They're the cops of the coastline, keeping it safe for the people who use it and from the people who try to harm it. These are the men and women of E-Force: The Florida Keys. Protecting the environment. Protecting YOU!
